GapFillDragDrop.Title: Future probability / possibility / certainty
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct word from the word pool to complete each sentence.

Content.Question:
1. Leaving the country may well turn out to be the best decision she ever made.
2. The chances are that you will never see him again.
3. We haven’t a hope of being there on time.
4. There is a strong possibility that interest rates will rise.
5. The rejection is bound to affect his confidence.
6. Presumably, we’ll be able to meet you after the match.
7. We could stop for a coffee on the way.
8. There is a slight possibility that we could be wrong.
9. I doubt she’ll even notice the difference.
10. It will almost definitely be the last time we see him.
